snippet: Two firms based in London are deciding to set up shop in the United States.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes London-based advertising and media companies Frank PR and Grace Blue are opening offices in the United States; points out newcomers typify a change in the expansion plans of British firms in that both are independently owned rather than units of giant holding companies.
lead_paragraph: Two firms based in London are deciding to set up shop in the United States.

headline.main: British Agencies See Opportunity in the Americas
headline.print_headline: British Agencies See Opportunity In the Americas
